content: 0xbbjoker: Merged three significant PRs this week, including #3805 for singleton PostgreSQL connections, #3803 addressing PostgreSQL migration issues (with substantial code changes of +93364/-87915 lines), and #3757 improving connection handling. Has one open PR (#3771) focused on static migrations, and previously created two database-related issues (#2634 and #2601) that are now closed, showing a concentrated effort on database infrastructure improvements.
